trans-unit.source: schema/2 is typically used to map data from a persisted source, usually a database table, into Elixir structs and vice-versa. For this reason, the first argument of schema/2 is the source (table) name. Structs defined with schema/2 also contain a __meta__ field with metadata holding the status of the struct, for example, if it has been built, loaded or deleted.
trans-unit.target: schema/2 通常用于将数据从持久性源（通常是数据库表）映射到Elixir结构中，反之亦然。因此， schema/2 的第一个参数是源（表）名称。用 schema/2 定义的结构还包含一个 __meta__ 字段，其中的元数据保存该结构的状态，例如，是否已构建，加载或删除了该结构。

trans-unit.source: Plug.Conn - a collection of low-level functions to work with the connection
trans-unit.target: Plug.Conn -与连接配合使用的底层函数的集合

trans-unit.source: Plug.Conn.put_status/2 takes conn as the first parameter and as the second parameter either an integer or a "friendly name" used as an atom for the status code we want to set. The list of status code atom representations can be found in Plug.Conn.Status.code/1 documentation.
trans-unit.target: Plug.Conn.put_status/2 将 conn 作为第一个参数，将整数或“友好名称”用作我们要设置的状态代码的原子作为第二个参数。状态代码原子表示形式的列表可以在 Plug.Conn.Status.code/1 文档中找到。

trans-unit.source: Plug.Head - converts HEAD requests to GET requests and strips the response body
trans-unit.target: Plug.Head-将HEAD请求转换为GET请求并剥离响应主体

trans-unit.source: Plug.MethodOverride - converts the request method to PUT, PATCH or DELETE for POST requests with a valid _method parameter
trans-unit.target: Plug.MethodOverride-使用有效的 _method 参数将POST请求的请求方法转换为PUT，PATCH或DELETE

trans-unit.source: Plug.Parsers - parses the request body when a known parser is available. By default parsers parse urlencoded, multipart and json (with jason). The request body is left untouched when the request content-type cannot be parsed
trans-unit.target: Plug.Parsers-在已知解析器可用时解析请求正文。默认情况下，解析器解析urlencoded，multipart和json（使用 jason ）。无法解析请求内容类型时，保持请求主体不变

trans-unit.source: Plug.RequestId - generates a unique request id for each request.
trans-unit.target: Plug.RequestId-为每个请求生成一个唯一的请求ID。

trans-unit.source: Plug.Session - a plug that sets up session management. Note that fetch_session/2 must still be explicitly called before using the session as this Plug just sets up how the session is fetched
trans-unit.target: Plug.Session-用于设置会话管理的插件。请注意，在使用会话之前，仍必须显式调用 fetch_session/2 ，因为此插件只是设置了如何获取会话

trans-unit.source: Plug.Static - serves static assets. Since this plug comes before the logger, serving of static assets is not logged
trans-unit.target: Plug.Static-提供静态资产。由于此插件位于记录器之前，因此不会记录静态资产的投放

trans-unit.source: Plug.Telemetry - adds instrumentation points so Phoenix can log the request path, status code and request time by default.
trans-unit.target: Plug.Telemetry-添加检测点，以便Phoenix默认情况下可以记录请求路径，状态代码和请求时间。

trans-unit.source: Ecto.Changeset - changesets provide a way for developers to filter and cast external parameters, as well as a mechanism to track and validate changes before they are applied to your data
trans-unit.target: Ecto.Changeset -变更集为开发人员提供了一种过滤和转换外部参数的方法，以及一种在将变更应用于数据之前对其进行跟踪和验证的机制

trans-unit.source: Ecto.Multi is a data structure for grouping multiple Repo operations.
trans-unit.target: Ecto.Multi 是用于分组多个Repo操作的数据结构。

trans-unit.source: Ecto.Multi makes it possible to pack operations that should be performed in a single database transaction and gives a way to introspect the queued operations without actually performing them. Each operation is given a name that is unique and will identify its result in case of success or failure.
trans-unit.target: Ecto.Multi 使打包应在单个数据库事务中执行的操作成为可能，并提供了一种对已排队的操作进行自省的方法，而无需实际执行。每个操作都有一个唯一的名称，如果成功或失败，它将标识其结果。

trans-unit.source: Ecto.Multi.to_list/1 returns a canonical representation of the structure that can be used for introspection.
trans-unit.target: Ecto.Multi.to_list/1 返回可用于自省的结构的规范表示。

trans-unit.source: Ecto.Query - written in Elixir syntax, queries are used to retrieve information from a given repository. Queries in Ecto are secure, avoiding common problems like SQL Injection, while still being composable, allowing developers to build queries piece by piece instead of all at once
trans-unit.target: Ecto.Query -用Elixir语法编写的查询用于从给定存储库中检索信息。Ecto中的查询是安全的，避免了诸如SQL注入之类的常见问题，同时仍可组合，从而使开发人员可以逐个而不是一次全部地构建查询

trans-unit.source: Ecto.Repo - repositories are wrappers around the data store. Via the repository, we can create, update, destroy and query existing entries. A repository needs an adapter and credentials to communicate to the database
trans-unit.target: Ecto.Repo -存储库是数据存储周围的包装器。通过存储库，我们可以创建，更新，销毁和查询现有条目。存储库需要适配器和凭据才能与数据库进行通信

trans-unit.target: Ecto.Repo 是数据库的包装器。我们可以如下定义存储库：

trans-unit.source: Ecto.Schema - schemas are used to map any data source into an Elixir struct. We will often use them to map tables into Elixir data but that’s one of their use cases and not a requirement for using Ecto
trans-unit.target: Ecto.Schema -模式用于将任何数据源映射到Elixir结构中。我们将经常使用它们将表映射到Elixir数据中，但这只是其用例之一，而不是使用Ecto的要求

trans-unit.source: Ecto.Schema - schemas are used to map any data source into an Elixir struct. We will often use them to map tables into Elixir data but that's one of their use cases and not a requirement for using Ecto
trans-unit.target: Ecto.Schema -模式用于将任何数据源映射到Elixir结构中。我们将经常使用它们将表映射到Elixir数据中，但这是它们的用例之一，而不是使用Ecto的要求

trans-unit.source: Optimistic locking (or optimistic concurrency control) is a technique that allows concurrent edits on a single record. While pessimistic locking works by locking a resource for an entire transaction, optimistic locking only checks if the resource changed before updating it.
trans-unit.target: 乐观锁定（或乐观并发控制）是一种允许对单个记录进行并发编辑的技术。悲观锁定通过锁定整个事务的资源来起作用，而乐观锁定仅在更新资源之前检查资源是否已更改。

trans-unit.source: Optimistic locking (or optimistic concurrency control) is a technique that allows concurrent edits on a single record. While pessimistic locking works by locking a resource for an entire transaction, optimistic locking only checks if the resource changed before updating it.
trans-unit.target: 乐观锁定（或乐观并发控制）是一种允许对单个记录进行并发编辑的技术。悲观锁定通过锁定整个事务的资源来起作用，而乐观锁定仅在更新资源之前检查资源是否已更改。

trans-unit.source: Plug is a specification for composable modules in between web applications. It is also an abstraction layer for connection adapters of different web servers. The basic idea of Plug is to unify the concept of a "connection" that we operate on. This differs from other HTTP middleware layers such as Rack, where the request and response are separated in the middleware stack.
trans-unit.target: 插件是Web应用程序之间可组合模块的规范。它也是不同Web服务器的连接适配器的抽象层。Plug的基本思想是统一我们操作的“连接”的概念。这不同于其他HTTP中间件层（例如Rack），在中间层中，请求和响应是分开的。

trans-unit.source: Phoenix.LiveView's built-in templates are identified by the .leex extension (Live EEx) or ~L sigil. They are similar to regular .eex templates except they are designed to minimize the amount of data sent over the wire by splitting static and dynamic parts and tracking changes.

trans-unit.source: Plug.Parsers can also be plugged between :match and :dispatch (like in the example above): this means that Plug.Parsers will run only if there is a matching route. This can be useful to perform actions such as authentication before parsing the body, which should only be parsed if a route matches afterwards.
trans-unit.target: Plug.Parsers 也可以插入 :match 和 :dispatch 之间（如上例所示）：这意味着 Plug.Parsers 仅在存在匹配的路由时运行。这对于在解析正文之前执行诸如身份验证之类的操作很有用，只有在路由匹配之后才进行解析。

trans-unit.source: Plug.SSL takes on another important role when using TLS offloading: it can update the :scheme and :port fields in the Plug.Conn struct based on an HTTP header (e.g. 'X-Forwarded-Proto'), to reflect the actual protocol used by the client (HTTP or HTTPS). It is very important that the :scheme field properly reflects the use of HTTPS, even if the connection between the proxy and the application uses plain HTTP, because cookies set by Plug.Session and Plug.Conn.put_resp_cookie/4 by default set the 'secure' cookie flag only if :scheme is set to :https! When relying on this default behaviour it is essential that Plug.SSL is included in the Plug pipeline, that its :rewrite_on option is set correctly, and that the proxy sets the appropriate header.
trans-unit.target: Plug.SSL 在使用TLS卸载时扮演着另一个重要角色：它可以基于HTTP标头（例如“ X-Forwarded-Proto”）更新 Plug.Conn 结构中的 :scheme 和 :port 字段，以反映实际协议由客户端（HTTP或HTTPS）使用。即使代理和应用程序之间的连接使用纯HTTP， :scheme 字段也必须正确反映HTTPS的使用，这一点非常重要，因为默认情况下，由 Plug.Session 和 Plug.Conn.put_resp_cookie/4 设置的cookie会设置“仅在 :scheme 设置为 :https 时, “安全” cookie标记！当依靠这种默认行为时，至关重要的是 Plug.SSL 包含在Plug管道中，其 :rewrite_on 选项已正确设置，并且代理设置了适当的标头。

trans-unit.source: Plug.Static uses etags for HTTP caching. This means browsers/clients should cache assets on the first request and validate the cache on following requests, not downloading the static asset once again if it has not changed. The cache-control for etags is specified by the cache_control_for_etags option and defaults to "public".
trans-unit.target: Plug.Static 使用etags进行HTTP缓存。这意味着浏览器/客户端应在第一个请求上缓存资产，并在随后的请求上验证缓存，如果静态资产没有更改，则不要再次下载静态资产。etags的缓存控件由 cache_control_for_etags 选项指定，默认为 "public" 。

trans-unit.target: :body_reader - Plug.Conn.read_body/2 的可选替换（或包装），以提供在原始主体被解析和丢弃之前提供对原始主体的访问的功能。它是 {Module, :function, [args]} （MFA）的标准格式，默认为 {Plug.Conn, :read_body, []} 。

trans-unit.source: :body_reader - an optional replacement (or wrapper) for Plug.Conn.read_body/2 to provide a function that gives access to the raw body before it is parsed and discarded. It is in the standard format of {Module, :function, [args]} (MFA) and defaults to {Plug.Conn, :read_body, []}. Note that this option is not used by Plug.Parsers.MULTIPART which relies instead on other functions defined in Plug.Conn.
trans-unit.target: :body_reader - Plug.Conn.read_body/2 的可选替换（或包装），以提供一个在原始主体被解析和丢弃之前提供对原始主体的访问的功能。它是 {Module, :function, [args]} （MFA）的标准格式，默认为 {Plug.Conn, :read_body, []} 。请注意， Plug.Parsers.MULTIPART 不使用此选项，而是依赖于 Plug.Conn 中定义的其他函数。

trans-unit.source: :broadcast_period - The interval in milliseconds to send delta broadcasts across the cluster. Default 1500
trans-unit.target: :broadcast_period -跨群集发送增量广播的时间间隔（以毫秒为单位）。默认值 1500

trans-unit.source: :brotli - given a request for FILE, serves FILE.br if it exists in the static directory and if the accept-encoding header is set to allow brotli-compressed content (defaults to false). FILE.br is checked first and dominates FILE.gz due to the better compression ratio.
trans-unit.target: :brotli -给定对 FILE 的请求，如果 FILE.br 存在于静态目录中，并且 accept-encoding 标头设置为允许brotli压缩的内容（默认为 false ），则将其提供给FILE.br。 FILE.br 检查 FILE.gz 由于更好的压缩率，它在FILE.gz中占主导地位。

trans-unit.source: :brotli - given a request for FILE, serves FILE.br if it exists in the static directory and if the accept-encoding header is set to allow brotli-compressed content (defaults to false). FILE.br is checked first and dominates FILE.gz due to the better compression ratio.
trans-unit.target: :brotli -给定对 FILE 的请求，如果 FILE.br 存在于静态目录中，并且 accept-encoding 标头设置为允许brotli压缩的内容（默认为 false ），则将其提供给FILE.br。 FILE.br 检查 FILE.gz 由于更好的压缩率，它在FILE.gz中占主导地位。

trans-unit.source: :cache_static_manifest - a path to a json manifest file that contains static files and their digested version. This is typically set to "priv/static/cache_manifest.json" which is the file automatically generated by mix phx.digest. It can be either: a string containing a file system path or a tuple containing the application name and the path within that application.
trans-unit.target: :cache_static_manifest -包含静态文件及其摘要版本的json清单文件的路径。通常将其设置为“ priv / static / cache_manifest.json”，这是由 mix phx.digest 自动生成的文件。它可以是：包含文件系统路径的字符串或包含应用程序名称和该应用程序内路径的元组。

trans-unit.source: :cache_static_manifest_latest - a map of the static files pointing to their digest version. This is automatically loaded from cache_static_manifest on boot. However, if you have your own static handling mechanism, you may want to set this value explicitly. This is used by projects such as LiveView to detect if the client is running on the latest version of all assets
trans-unit.target: :cache_static_manifest_latest -静态文件的映射，指向其摘要版本。这是在引导时从 cache_static_manifest 自动加载的。但是，如果您有自己的静态处理机制，则可能需要显式设置此值。诸如 LiveView 之类的项目使用它来检测客户端是否在所有资产的最新版本上运行

trans-unit.source: :check_origin - if the transport should check the origin of requests when the origin header is present. May be true, false, a list of hosts that are allowed, or a function provided as MFA tuple. Defaults to :check_origin setting at endpoint configuration.

trans-unit.source: :check_origin - if we should check the origin of requests when the origin header is present. It defaults to true and, in such cases, it will check against the host value in YourApp.Endpoint.config(:url)[:host]. It may be set to false (not recommended) or to a list of explicitly allowed origins
trans-unit.target: :check_origin -如果存在原始标头，我们是否应该检查请求的原始。默认为true，在这种情况下，它将检查 YourApp.Endpoint.config(:url)[:host] 中的主机值。可以将其设置为 false （不建议）或明确允许的来源列表

trans-unit.target: :conflict -409

trans-unit.source: :conflict_target - A list of column names to verify for conflicts. It is expected those columns to have unique indexes on them that may conflict. If none is specified, the conflict target is left up to the database. It may also be {:constraint, constraint_name_as_atom} in databases that support the “ON CONSTRAINT” expression, such as PostgreSQL, or {:unsafe_fragment, binary_fragment} to pass any expression to the database without any sanitization, such as ON CONFLICT (coalesce(firstname, ""), coalesce(lastname, "")).
trans-unit.target: :conflict_target -验证冲突的列名列表。期望这些列在它们上具有可能冲突的唯一索引。如果未指定，则将冲突目标留给数据库。在支持“ ON CONSTRAINT”表达式的数据库中，例如PostgreSQL，它也可以是 {:constraint, constraint_name_as_atom} ，或者在不进行任何消毒的情况下，将 {:unsafe_fragment, binary_fragment} 传递给数据库，例如 ON CONFLICT (coalesce(firstname, ""), coalesce(lastname, "")) 。

trans-unit.source: :conflict_target - A list of column names to verify for conflicts. It is expected those columns to have unique indexes on them that may conflict. If none is specified, the conflict target is left up to the database. It may also be {:unsafe_fragment, binary_fragment} to pass any expression to the database without any sanitization, this is useful for partial index or index with expressions, such as ON CONFLICT (coalesce(firstname, ""), coalesce(lastname, "")).
trans-unit.target: :conflict_target -验证冲突的列名列表。期望这些列在它们上具有可能会冲突的唯一索引。如果未指定，则将冲突目标留给数据库。也可以将 {:unsafe_fragment, binary_fragment} 传递给数据库而无需任何清理，这对于部分索引或带有表达式的索引很有用，例如 ON CONFLICT (coalesce(firstname, ""), coalesce(lastname, "")) 。

trans-unit.source: :conflict_target - A list of column names to verify for conflicts. It is expected those columns to have unique indexes on them that may conflict. If none is specified, the conflict target is left up to the database. May also be {:constraint, constraint_name_as_atom} in databases that support the “ON CONSTRAINT” expression, such as PostgreSQL.
trans-unit.target: :conflict_target -验证冲突的列名列表。期望这些列在它们上具有可能冲突的唯一索引。如果未指定，则将冲突目标留给数据库。在支持“ ON CONSTRAINT”表达式的数据库中，例如PostgreSQL，也可以是 {:constraint, constraint_name_as_atom} 。

trans-unit.source: :defaults - Default values to use when building the association. It may be a keyword list of options that override the association schema or a {module, function, args} that receive the struct and the owner as arguments. For example, if you set Post.has_many :comments, defaults: [public: true], then when using Ecto.build_assoc(post, :comments) that comment will have comment.public == true. Alternatively, you can set it to Post.has_many :comments, defaults: {__MODULE__, :update_comment, []} and Post.update_comment(comment, post) will be invoked.
trans-unit.target: :defaults -建立关联时要使用的默认值。它可以是覆盖关联架构的选项的关键字列表，也可以是将结构和所有者作为参数接收的 {module, function, args} 。例如，如果设置 Post.has_many :comments, defaults: [public: true] ，则在使用 Ecto.build_assoc(post, :comments) ，该注释将具有 comment.public == true 。或者，您可以将其设置为 Post.has_many :comments, defaults: {__MODULE__, :update_comment, []} 和 Post.update_comment(comment, post) 将被调用。

trans-unit.source: :force_ssl - ensures no data is ever sent via HTTP, always redirecting to HTTPS. It expects a list of options which are forwarded to Plug.SSL. By default it sets the "strict-transport-security" header in HTTPS requests, forcing browsers to always use HTTPS. If an unsafe request (HTTP) is sent, it redirects to the HTTPS version using the :host specified in the :url configuration. To dynamically redirect to the host of the current request, set :host in the :force_ssl configuration to nil
trans-unit.target: :force_ssl -确保没有数据通过HTTP发送，始终重定向到HTTPS。它需要转发到 Plug.SSL 的选项列表。默认情况下，它在HTTPS请求中设置“ strict-transport-security”标头，从而迫使浏览器始终使用HTTPS。如果发送了不安全的请求（HTTP），它将使用 :url 配置中指定的 :host 重定向到HTTPS版本。为了动态重定向到 host 当前请求，组 :host 中 :force_ssl 配置到 nil

trans-unit.source: :force_ssl - ensures no data is ever sent via http, always redirecting to https. It expects a list of options which are forwarded to Plug.SSL. By defalts it sets the “strict-transport-security” header in https requests, forcing browsers to always use https. If an unsafe request (http) is sent, it redirects to the https version using the :host specified in the :url configuration. To dynamically redirect to the host of the current request, :host must be set nil.
trans-unit.target: :force_ssl -确保没有数据通过http发送，始终重定向到https。它需要转发到 Plug.SSL 的选项列表。通过默认，它在https请求中设置了“ strict-transport-security”标头，从而迫使浏览器始终使用https。如果发送了不安全的请求（http），它将使用 :url 配置中指定的 :host 重定向到https版本。为了动态重定向到 host 当前请求的， :host 必须设置 nil 。

trans-unit.source: :on_delete - The action taken on associations when parent record is deleted. May be :nothing (default), :nilify_all and :delete_all. Using this option is DISCOURAGED for most relational databases. Instead, in your migration, set references(:parent_id, on_delete: :delete_all). Opposite to the migration option, this option cannot guarantee integrity and it is only triggered for Ecto.Repo.delete/2 (and not on Ecto.Repo.delete_all/2) and it never cascades. If posts has many comments, which has many tags, and you delete a post, only comments will be deleted. If your database does not support references, cascading can be manually implemented by using Ecto.Multi or Ecto.Changeset.prepare_changes/2
trans-unit.target: :on_delete -删除父记录时对关联采取的操作。可能是 :nothing （默认） :nilify_all 和 :delete_all 。对于大多数关系数据库，不建议使用此选项。相反，在您的迁移中，设置 references(:parent_id, on_delete: :delete_all) 。与迁移选项相反，此选项不能保证完整性，并且仅会为 Ecto.Repo.delete/2 触发（而不是在 Ecto.Repo.delete_all/2 上触发），并且永远不会级联。如果帖子中有很多评论，并且其中有很多标签，而您删除了某个帖子，则只会删除评论。如果您的数据库不支持引用，则可以使用 Ecto.Multi 手动实现级联或 Ecto.Changeset.prepare_changes/2

trans-unit.source: :on_delete - The action taken on associations when parent record is deleted. May be :nothing (default), :nilify_all and :delete_all. Using this option is DISCOURAGED for most relational databases. Instead, in your migration, set references(:parent_id, on_delete: :delete_all). Opposite to the migration option, this option cannot guarantee integrity and it is only triggered for Ecto.Repo.delete/2 (and not on Ecto.Repo.delete_all/2) and it never cascades. If posts has many comments, which has many tags, and you delete a post, only comments will be deleted. If your database does not support references, cascading can be manually implemented by using Ecto.Multi or Ecto.Changeset.prepare_changes/2.
trans-unit.target: :on_delete -删除父记录时对关联采取的操作。可能是 :nothing （默认） :nilify_all 和 :delete_all 。对于大多数关系数据库，不建议使用此选项。相反，在您的迁移中，设置 references(:parent_id, on_delete: :delete_all) 。与迁移选项相反，此选项不能保证完整性，并且仅会为 Ecto.Repo.delete/2 触发（而不是在 Ecto.Repo.delete_all/2 上触发），并且永远不会级联。如果帖子中有很多评论，并且其中有很多标签，而您删除了某个帖子，则只会删除评论。如果您的数据库不支持引用，则可以使用 Ecto.Multi 手动实现级联或 Ecto.Changeset.prepare_changes/2 。

trans-unit.source: :on_delete - The action taken on associations when the parent record is deleted. May be :nothing (default) or :delete_all. Using this option is DISCOURAGED for most relational databases. Instead, in your migration, set references(:parent_id, on_delete: :delete_all). Opposite to the migration option, this option cannot guarantee integrity and it is only triggered for Ecto.Repo.delete/2 (and not on Ecto.Repo.delete_all/2). This option can only remove data from the join source, never the associated records, and it never cascades.
trans-unit.target: :on_delete -删除父记录时对关联采取的操作。可能是 :nothing （默认）或 :delete_all 。对于大多数关系数据库，不建议使用此选项。相反，在您的迁移中，设置 references(:parent_id, on_delete: :delete_all) 。与迁移选项相反，此选项不能保证完整性，并且仅对 Ecto.Repo.delete/2 触发（而不是在 Ecto.Repo.delete_all/2 上触发）。此选项只能从联接源中除去数据，而从关联记录中除去数据，并且从不级联。

trans-unit.source: :only - a list of actions to generate routes for, for example: [:show, :edit]
trans-unit.target: :only only-生成路由的动作列表，例如： [:show, :edit]

trans-unit.source: :only - filters which requests to serve. This is useful to avoid file system traversals on every request when this plug is mounted at "/". For example, if only: ["images", "favicon.ico"] is specified, only files in the "images" directory and the "favicon.ico" file will be served by Plug.Static. Note that Plug.Static matches these filters against request uri and not against the filesystem. When requesting a file with name containing non-ascii or special characters, you should use urlencoded form. For example, you should write only: ["file%20name"] instead of only: ["file name"]. Defaults to nil (no filtering).
trans-unit.target: :only -过滤要投放的请求。当此插件安装在 "/" 位置时，这对于避免在每个请求上遍历文件系统都是很有用的。例如，如果 only: ["images", "favicon.ico"] 则 Plug.Static 将仅提供“ images”目录和“ favicon.ico”文件中的文件。请注意， Plug.Static 将这些过滤器与请求uri（而不是文件系统）进行匹配。当请求名称包含非ASCII或特殊字符的文件时，应使用urlencoded格式。例如，您应该 only: ["file%20name"] 写：[“ file％20name”]而不是 only: ["file name"] 。默认为 nil （不过滤）。

trans-unit.source: :only - filters which requests to serve. This is useful to avoid file system traversals on every request when this plug is mounted at "/". For example, if only: ["images", "favicon.ico"] is specified, only files in the “images” directory and the exact “favicon.ico” file will be served by Plug.Static. Defaults to nil (no filtering).
trans-unit.target: :only -过滤要投放的请求。当此插件安装在 "/" 位置时，这对于避免在每个请求上遍历文件系统都是很有用的。例如，如果 only: ["images", "favicon.ico"] 则 Plug.Static 将仅提供“ images”目录中的文件以及确切的“ favicon.ico”文件。默认为 nil （不过滤）。

trans-unit.source: :only_matching - a relaxed version of :only that will serve any request as long as one of the given values matches the given path. For example, only_matching: ["images", "favicon"] will match any request that starts at "images" or "favicon", be it "/images/foo.png", "/images-high/foo.png", "/favicon.ico" or "/favicon-high.ico". Such matches are useful when serving digested files at the root. Defaults to nil (no filtering).
trans-unit.target: :only_matching -一个宽松的版 :only 将服务于任何要求，只要给定值中的一个给定的路径相匹配。例如， only_matching: ["images", "favicon"] 将匹配以“ images”或“ favicon”开头的任何请求，无论是“ /images/foo.png"、"/images-high/foo.png” ，“ / favicon.ico”或“ /favicon-high.ico”。在根目录中提供摘要文件时，此类匹配很有用。默认为 nil （不过滤）。

trans-unit.source: :only_matching - a relaxed version of :only that will serve any request as long as one of the given values matches the given path. For example, only_matching: ["images", "favicon"] will match any request that starts at “images” or “favicon”, be it “/images/foo.png”, “/images-high/foo.png”, “/favicon.ico” or “/favicon-high.ico”. Such matches are useful when serving digested files at the root. Defaults to nil (no filtering).
trans-unit.target: :only_matching -一个宽松的版 :only 将服务于任何要求，只要给定值中的一个给定的路径相匹配。例如， only_matching: ["images", "favicon"] 将匹配以“ images”或“ favicon”开头的任何请求，无论是“ /images/foo.png”、“/images-high/foo.png” ，“ / favicon.ico”或“ /favicon-high.ico”。在根目录中提供摘要文件时，此类匹配很有用。默认为 nil （不过滤）。

trans-unit.source: :pubsub - configuration for this endpoint’s pubsub adapter. Configuration either requires a :name of the registered pubsub server or a :name and :adapter pair. The pubsub name and adapter are compile time configuration, while the remaining options are runtime. The given adapter and name pair will be started as part of the supervision tree. If no adapter is specified, the pubsub system will work by sending events and subscribing to the given name. Defaults to:

trans-unit.source: :telemetry_prefix - we recommend adapters to publish events using the Telemetry library. By default, the telemetry prefix is based on the module name, so if your module is called MyApp.Repo, the prefix will be [:my_app, :repo]. See the "Telemetry Events" section to see which events we recommend adapters to publish. Note that if you have multiple databases, you should keep the :telemetry_prefix consistent for each repo and use the :repo property in the event metadata for distinguishing between repos.

trans-unit.source: :unique - When true, checks if the associated entries are unique whenever the association is cast or changed via the parent record. For instance, it would verify that a given tag cannot be attached to the same post more than once. This exists mostly as a quick check for user feedback, as it does not guarantee uniqueness at the database level. Therefore, you should also set a unique index in the database join table, such as: create unique_index(:posts_tags, [:post_id, :tag_id])
trans-unit.target: :unique -为true时，每当通过父记录强制转换或更改关联时，检查关联的条目是否唯一。例如，它将验证给定标签不能多次附加到同一帖子。这主要是为了快速检查用户反馈，因为它不能保证数据库级别的唯一性。因此，您还应该在数据库 create unique_index(:posts_tags, [:post_id, :tag_id]) 表中设置唯一索引，例如：create unique_index（：posts_tags，[：post_id，：tag_id]）

trans-unit.source: :unique - When true, checks if the associated entries are unique. This is done by checking the primary key of the associated entries during repository operations. Keep in mind this does not guarantee uniqueness at the database level. For such it is preferred to set a unique index in the database. For example: create unique_index(:posts_tags, [:post_id, :tag_id])
trans-unit.target: :unique -为 true时，检查关联的条目是否唯一。这是通过在存储库操作期间检查关联条目的主键来完成的。请记住，这不能保证数据库级别的唯一性。为此，最好在数据库中设置唯一索引。例如： create unique_index(:posts_tags, [:post_id, :tag_id])

trans-unit.target: :with :clear_session 应该是 :exception 或：clear_session之一。默认为 :exception 。

trans-unit.source: :with - the function to build the changeset from params. Defaults to the changeset/2 function of the associated module. It can be changed by passing an anonymous function or an MFA tuple. If using an MFA, the default changeset and parameters arguments will be prepended to the given args. For example, using with: {Author, :special_changeset, ["hello"]} will be invoked as Author.special_changeset(changeset, params, "hello")
trans-unit.target: :with with-从params构建变更集的函数。默认为关联模块的 changeset/2 函数。可以通过传递匿名函数或MFA元组来更改它。如果使用MFA，则默认的changeset和parameters参数将添加到给定的args之前。例如， with: {Author, :special_changeset, ["hello"]} 使用：{Author，：special_changeset，[“ hello”]}将作为 Author.special_changeset(changeset, params, "hello") 调用

trans-unit.source: :with - the function to build the changeset from params. Defaults to the changeset/2 function of the embedded module. It can be changed by passing an anonymous function or an MFA tuple. If using an MFA, the default changeset and parameters arguments will be prepended to the given args. For example, using with: {Author, :special_changeset, ["hello"]} will be invoked as Author.special_changeset(changeset, params, "hello")
trans-unit.target: :with with-从params构建变更集的函数。默认为嵌入式模块的 changeset/2 功能。可以通过传递匿名函数或MFA元组来更改它。如果使用MFA，则默认的changeset和parameters参数将添加到给定的args之前。例如， with: {Author, :special_changeset, ["hello"]} 使用：{Author，：special_changeset，[“ hello”]}将作为 Author.special_changeset(changeset, params, "hello") 调用

trans-unit.source: @field_source_mapper - a function that receives the current field name and returns the mapping of this field name in the underlying source. In other words, it is a mechanism to automatically generate the :source option for the field macro. It defaults to fn x -> x end, where no field transformation is done;
trans-unit.target: @field_source_mapper -接收当前字段名称并返回该字段名称在基础源中的映射的函数。换句话说，它是一种为 field 宏自动生成 :source 选项的机制。它默认为 fn x -> x end ，其中不进行任何字段转换。

trans-unit.source: @primary_key - configures the schema primary key. It expects a tuple {field_name, type, options} with the primary key field name, type (typically :id or :binary_id, but can be any type) and options. Defaults to {:id, :id, autogenerate: true}. When set to false, does not define a primary key in the schema unless composite keys are defined using the options of field.
trans-unit.target: @primary_key -配置架构主键。它期望具有主键字段名称，类型（通常为 :id 或 :binary_id ，但可以是任何类型）和选项的元组 {field_name, type, options} 。默认为 {:id, :id, autogenerate: true} 。设置为 false 时，除非使用 field 选项定义复合键，否则不会在架构中定义主键。

trans-unit.source: @primary_key - configures the schema primary key. It expects a tuple {field_name, type, options} with the primary key field name, type (typically :id or :binary_id, but can be any type) and options. It also accepts false to disable the generation of a primary key field. Defaults to {:id, :id, autogenerate: true}.
trans-unit.target: @primary_key -配置架构主键。它需要一个具有主键字段名称，类型（通常为 :id 或 :binary_id ，但可以是任何类型）和选项的元组 {field_name, type, options} 。它还接受 false 以禁用主键字段的生成。默认为 {:id, :id, autogenerate: true} 。

trans-unit.source: @schema_prefix - configures the schema prefix. Defaults to nil, which generates structs and queries without prefix. When set, the prefix will be used by every built struct and on queries whenever the schema is used in a from or a join. In PostgreSQL, the prefix is called "SCHEMA" (typically set via Postgres' search_path). In MySQL the prefix points to databases.
trans-unit.target: @schema_prefix -配置架构前缀。默认为 nil ，它生成没有前缀的结构和查询。设置后，每当在 from 或 join 中使用模式时，所有构建的结构和查询都将使用该前缀。在PostgreSQL中，前缀称为“ SCHEMA”（通常通过Postgres的 search_path 设置）。在MySQL中，前缀指向数据库。

trans-unit.source: @schema_prefix - configures the schema prefix. Defaults to nil, which generates structs and queries without prefix. When set, the prefix will be used by every built struct and on queries whenever the schema is used in a from or a join. In PostgreSQL, the prefix is called “SCHEMA” (typically set via Postgres’ search_path). In MySQL the prefix points to databases.
trans-unit.target: @schema_prefix -配置架构前缀。默认为 nil ，它生成没有前缀的结构和查询。设置后，每当在 from 或 join 中使用模式时，每个构建的结构和查询将使用该前缀。在PostgreSQL中，前缀称为“ SCHEMA”（通常通过Postgres的 search_path 设置）。在MySQL中，前缀指向数据库。

trans-unit.source: [:ecto, :repo, :init] - dispatched by Ecto.Repo.Supervisor

trans-unit.source: [:ecto, :repo, :init] - it is invoked whenever a repository starts. The measurement is a single system_time entry in native unit. The metadata is the :repo and all initialization options under :opts.
trans-unit.target: [:ecto, :repo, :init] -每当存储库启动时都会调用它。该度量是本机单位中的单个 system_time 条目。元数据是 :repo 和 :opts 下的所有初始化选项。

trans-unit.source: [:my, :plug, :start] - emitted when the plug is invoked. The event carries the system_time as measurement. The metadata is the whole Plug.Conn under the :conn key and any leftover options given to the plug under :options.
trans-unit.target: [:my, :plug, :start] -调用插件时发出。该事件带有 system_time 作为度量。元数据是 :conn 键下的整个 Plug.Conn ，以及： options下给该插件的所有剩余 :options 。

trans-unit.source: [:my, :plug, :stop] - emitted right before the request is sent. The event carries a single measurement, :duration, which is the monotonic time difference between the stop and start events. It has the same metadata as the start event, except the connection has been updated.
trans-unit.target: [:my, :plug, :stop] -在发送请求之前发出。该事件带有一个单独的测量值 :duration ，它是停止事件和开始事件之间的单调时间差。它具有与开始事件相同的元数据，只是连接已更新。

trans-unit.source: [:my_app, :repo, :query] - should be invoked on every query send to the adapter, including queries that are related to the transaction management. The measurement will be the time necessary to run the query including queue and encoding time. The metadata is a map where we recommend developers to pass at least the same keys as found in the Ecto.LogEntry struct
trans-unit.target: [:my_app, :repo, :query] -应该在发送到适配器的每个查询（包括与事务管理相关的查询）上调用。该度量将是运行查询所需的时间，包括队列和编码时间。元数据是一个映射，我们建议开发人员在其中传递至少与 Ecto.LogEntry 结构中找到的键相同的键

trans-unit.source: __schema__(:type, field) - Returns the type of the given non-virtual field;

trans-unit.source: _build - a directory created by the mix command line tool that ships as part of Elixir that holds all compilation artefacts. As we have seen in "Up and Running", mix is the main interface to your application. We use Mix to compile our code, create databases, run our server, and more. This directory must not be checked into version control and it can be removed at any time. Removing it will force Mix to rebuild your application from scratch
trans-unit.target: _build -由 mix 命令行工具创建的目录，该目录作为Elixir的一部分提供，包含所有编译工件。正如我们在“启动并运行”中所看到的那样， mix 是应用程序的主要界面。我们使用Mix来编译代码，创建数据库，运行服务器等等。不得将此目录检入版本控制，并且可以随时将其删除。删除它会迫使Mix从头开始重建您的应用程序

trans-unit.source: action - The action to be performed with the changeset

trans-unit.source: adapter - holds the adapter information in a tuple

trans-unit.source: age - The max age of assets to keep in seconds

trans-unit.source: append - append the new DOM contents instead of replacing

trans-unit.source: args is the argument term (second argument) passed to start_link/3.

trans-unit.source: assets - a directory that keeps everything related to front-end assets, such as JavaScript, CSS, static images and more. It is typically handled by the npm tool. Phoenix developers typically only need to run npm install inside the assets directory. Everything else is managed by Phoenix
trans-unit.target: assets -存放与前端资产相关的所有内容的目录，例如JavaScript，CSS，静态图像等。通常由 npm 工具处理。Phoenix开发人员通常只需要在资产目录中运行 npm install 即可。其他一切都由凤凰城管理

trans-unit.source: assigns - The map of socket assigns, default: %{}
trans-unit.target: assigns 套接字分配的映射，默认值： %{}

trans-unit.source: assigns - a dictionary with the assigns to be used in the view. Those assigns are merged and have higher precedence than the connection assigns (conn.assigns)
trans-unit.target: assigns -包含要在视图中使用的分配的字典。这些分配已合并，并且具有比连接分配（ conn.assigns ）更高的优先级。

trans-unit.source: assigns - shared user data as a map
trans-unit.target: assigns -共享的用户数据作为地图

trans-unit.source: beforeDestroy - the element is about to be removed from the DOM. Note: any call here must be synchronous as the operation cannot be deferred or cancelled.
trans-unit.target: beforeDestroy -元素即将从DOM中移除。注意：此处的任何调用都必须是同步的，因为无法推迟或取消该操作。

trans-unit.source: beforeUpdate - the element is about to be updated in the DOM. Note: any call here must be synchronous as the operation cannot be deferred or cancelled.
trans-unit.target: beforeUpdate -元素将在DOM中更新。注意：此处的任何调用都必须是同步的，因为无法推迟或取消该操作。

trans-unit.source: bindingPrefix - the prefix to use for phoenix bindings. Defaults "phx-"
trans-unit.target: bindingPrefix -用于凤凰绑定的前缀。默认为 "phx-"

trans-unit.source: body_params - the request body params, populated through a Plug.Parsers parser.
trans-unit.target: body_params -通过 Plug.Parsers 解析器填充的请求正文参数。

trans-unit.source: broadcast - broadcasts a message on the given topic sends: {:broadcast, :none | pid, topic, message} respond with: :ok | {:error, reason} | {:perform, {m, f, a}}
trans-unit.target: broadcast -广播有关给定主题的消息，发送： {:broadcast, :none | pid, topic, message} 回复 :ok | {:error, reason} | {:perform, {m, f, a}}

trans-unit.source: broadcast_period - The interval in milliseconds to send delta broadcats across the cluster. Default 1500
trans-unit.target: broadcast_period -以毫秒为单位的时间间隔，以跨群集发送增量大猫。默认值 1500

trans-unit.source: call/2 which carries out the connection transformation. call/2 is just a function plug that we saw earlier

trans-unit.source: cardinality - The association cardinality
trans-unit.target: cardinality -关联基数

trans-unit.source: cast/3 first takes a struct, then the parameters (the proposed updates), and then the final field is the list of columns to be updated. cast/3 also will only take fields that exist in the schema.
trans-unit.target: cast/3 首先获取一个struct，然后获取参数（建议的更新），然后最后一个字段是要更新的列的列表。 cast/3 也将仅采用模式中存在的字段。

trans-unit.source: changes - The changes from parameters that were approved in casting
trans-unit.target: changes - 铸造中已批准参数的 changes

trans-unit.source: changes - changes are merged giving precedence to the changeset2 changes.
trans-unit.target: changes -合并更改，使 changeset2 更改具有优先权。

trans-unit.source: changes is a map or keyword where the key is an atom representing a field, association or embed and the value is a term. Note the value is directly stored in the changeset with no validation whatsoever. For this reason, this function is meant for working with data internal to the application.
trans-unit.target: changes 是一个地图或关键字，其中键是代表字段，关联或嵌入的原子，而值是一个术语。请注意，该 value 直接存储在变更集中，而无需进行任何验证。因此，此功能用于处理应用程序内部的数据。

trans-unit.source: channel - The current channel module
trans-unit.target: channel -当前通道模块

trans-unit.source: channel_pid - The channel pid
trans-unit.target: channel_pid -通道pid

trans-unit.source: checkout/2 and transaction/2 can be combined and nested multiple times. If checkout/2 is called inside the function of another checkout/2 call, the function is simply executed, without checking out a new connection.
trans-unit.target: checkout/2 和 transaction/2 可以组合和嵌套多次。如果 checkout/2 被称为另一个的函数内 checkout/2 调用，功能简单地执行，没有检查出一个新的连接。

trans-unit.source: child_spec will receive all options given Phoenix.PubSub. Note, however, that the :name under options is the name of the complete PubSub system. The name of the process to be used by adapter is under the :adapter_name key.
trans-unit.target: child_spec 将获得 Phoenix.PubSub 给定的所有选项。但是请注意，options下的 :name 是完整的PubSub系统的名称。适配器要使用的进程的名称在 :adapter_name 键下。

trans-unit.source: clock_sample_periods - The numbers of heartbeat windows to sample remote clocks before collapsing and requesting transfer. Default 2
trans-unit.target: clock_sample_periods -在崩溃和请求传输之前对远程时钟进行采样的心跳窗口数。默认值 2

trans-unit.source: compile_metadata is a map of compile-time metadata about the environment where instrument/3 has been called. It contains the module where the instrumentation is happening (under the :module key), the file and line (:file and :line), and the function inside which the instrumentation is happening (under :function). This information can be used arbitrarily by the callback.
trans-unit.target: compile_metadata 是有关 instrument/3 被调用的环境的编译时元数据的映射。它包含要进行检测的模块（在 :module 键下），文件和行（ :file 和 :line ）以及要在其中进行检测的函数（在 :function 下）。回调可以随意使用此信息。

trans-unit.source: config - a directory that holds your project configuration. The config/config.exs file is the main entry point for your configuration. At the end of the config/config.exs, it imports environment specific configuration, which can be found in config/dev.exs, config/test.exs, and config/prod.exs
trans-unit.target: config -保存您的项目配置的目录。在 config/config.exs 文件是为您的配置的主入口点。在 config/config.exs 的末尾，它导入特定于环境的配置，可以在 config/dev.exs ， config/test.exs 和 config/prod.exs 中找到。

trans-unit.source: deps - a directory with all of our Mix dependencies. You can find all dependencies listed in the mix.exs file, inside the def deps do function definition. This directory must not be checked into version control and it can be removed at any time. Removing it will force Mix to download all deps from scratch
trans-unit.target: deps -具有所有Mix依赖项的目录。您可以在 def deps do 函数定义内的 mix.exs 文件中找到列出的所有依赖项。不得将此目录检入版本控制，并且可以随时将其删除。删除它会强制Mix从头开始下载所有dep

trans-unit.source: down_period - The interval in milliseconds to flag a replica as down temporarily down. Default broadcast_period * max_silent_periods * 2 (30s down detection). Note: This must be at least 2x the broadcast_period.
trans-unit.target: down_period -将副本标记为暂时关闭的时间间隔（以毫秒为单位）。默认的 broadcast_period * max_silent_periods * 2 （向下检测30秒）。注意：该值必须至少是 broadcast_period 的 2倍。
